title: Ep55 South African Crimes
description: This week, the gals head to South Africa to investigate some crimes south of the equator. Topics include a a vineyard “suicide,” some scandalous text messages, and a teen with a literal axe to grind. Pour yourself a glass of Winc’s Cape Route Chenin Blanc, don’t forget your passport, and tune in for South Africa Crimes.   This episode is supported by TalkSpace. Get $30 off your first month with promo code "GALS" www.talkspace.com/gals
